text: Myristica cinnamomea is a species of plant in the Myristicaceae (Nutmeg) family. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore and Borneo. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Myristica cinnamomea. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica cinnamomea
